summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4440 for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 15 and 16, Evans & Blewett's Addition, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52419, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
